price: Umunsi bazasunikirwa mu muriro wa Jahanamu ku ngufu.
arabic: يَوۡمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: yawma yudaʿʿūna ilā nāri jahannama daʿʿan
